meanings.definition: Synthases: enzymes that catalyze the synthesis of molecules
meanings.sent1: The synthases in our bodies help create important substances.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study synthases to understand how molecules are made.
meanings.sent3: The synthases at the molecular party were busy mixing things up.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity acted like synthases, combining ideas into new inventions.
meanings.sent5: The synthases worked tirelessly, building molecules like tiny architects.

meanings.definition: Synthases: proteins that facilitate the formation of chemical compounds
meanings.sent1: These synthases play a key role in producing compounds for various purposes.
meanings.sent2: The lab is researching how synthases aid in chemical compound creation.
meanings.sent3: The synthases in the kitchen seemed to magically blend ingredients together.
meanings.sent4: His leadership acted as synthases, bringing together different teams effectively.
meanings.sent5: The synthases in nature work harmoniously to build complex chemical structures.
